post.text:
Equality is on the ballot.
Justice is on the ballot.
Our progress is on the ballot. 
IWillVote.com

comment.author: Kory
comment.text: Don't be fooled, Hillary won't help on equality. She would not do it for thirty years, why would she start now?

replies.author: Donna
replies.text: Yes, Trump should be in jail !! The info about Hilary came out to attempt to distract everyone from Trump's losses & criminal activities ! What about Trump's child rape case and the Trump University fraud case. Funny how the media is not talking about Trump's criminal trials !! We don't care about emails that amount to nothing !! Trump is a lowlife, who has been accused of being a sexual predator by more than 10 women, and a con man, he is a disgrace to this country !
